title: Drawing, "Design for a Cocktail Spoon", June, 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Verso, stamped in black ink upside down, center left: 75
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower right: CUILLER A COCKTAILS / LONGUEUR TOTALE 30 cms; lower left: JEAN PUIFORCAT/6.41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Oval-shaped bowl with long handle drawn in elevation, profile, and plan. Top section of handle with fluted decoration. Underdrawing in graphite of spoon in golden section. Puiforcat Fabrication #: 75.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cocktail Spoon", June, 1941.
June, 1941. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-13.
